text: Luisa Pimentel-Ejército (also Loi Ejercito Estrada or simply Loi Estrada; born Luisa Fernandez Pimentel on 2 June 1931), is the wife of Philippine President Joseph Ejercito Estrada. She was the twelfth First Spouse of the Philippines from 1998 to 2001. ==References== ==Other websites== *Senate of the Philippines – Loi Ejercito Estrada *Senate of the Philippines – Loi Ejercito Estrada biography Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies and First Gentlemen of the Philippines Category:People from Zambales
title: Loi Ejercito
